about_the_game:
On a small island lives a girl called Lily. Her world is turned upside down when she comes into contact with a mysterious seashell and finds herself being able to travel across space and time. However, there is another being inside Lily and the two will have to work together to find a way out and return home.

FEATURES

Inspired by titles such as CHRONO TRIGGER, TERRANIGMA and ECCO THE DOLPHIN NAUTILUS EPOCH combines the best of story-driven RPGs with endless mysteries of the deep.

 A UNIQUE battle system which involves mastering different gameplay systems

-Collect FATHOMS to make contact with ANIMA

-Alight the star constellations of each ANIMA

-Use both words and symbology to capture each ANIMA

EXPLORE a multitude of environments from different time periods of earth's history painted using real watercolors

A GRIPPING STORY of survival and human co-existence with other species and nature
